events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected and I want to request a refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message about wanting money back.
Assigning the refund case to the customer support specialist team for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you would like a refund so we can assist you better?
My order number is 123456789. The item was different from the description and I am really disappointed.
We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please send the product back using the pre-paid return label we will provide.
Thank you, I appreciate your quick response. I will send the item back as soon as possible.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing this case now as your refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is important to us.
